attributes.action: Hold a full enquiry into The decision to allow serving personnel in the Armed forces to sell their stories to the media sparking a propaganda row.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Anyone with the slightest awareness understood this to be a bad decision. Testament to this was the outrage expressed in the media and on bulletin boards. Why was such an error allowed to pass. What are these "Special Circumstances?" we hear officials talking about. 
This was a crass error of judgement,  made at such a sensitive time. Des Brown/Tony Blair you are accountable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
